text: I confirmed that LLVM libunwind does defined `__register_frame` and it does seem to be called correctly. I did notice that LLVM libunwind defines `_LIBUNWIND_BUILD_SJLJ_APIS` on Apple ARM (<https://github.com/llvm/llvm-project/blob/main/libunwind/src/config.h#L100>) so possibly that is related. I also noticed that Julia on Win32 has some references to SJLJ which may have some code paths needed for Apple Silicon.

text: Are there separate code paths for Windows with SjLj vs. SEH? I thought we required SjLj on Windows but maybe things have changed in the past couple of years since I last looked at that.

text: I believe DWARF is still supported (<https://github.com/llvm/llvm-project/blob/c4ad878acb62d0264072e28f413178d5d8670e49/libunwind/src/config.h#L29>)
